website_summaries.verdict: The best value. You won't find another piece of office furniture that offers as much for so little.
pros: It's compact, both its frame and working surfaces are made to last, and it offers plenty of space and flexibility
cons: Not industrial grade, so it's not as durable as the Sauder Harverst Mill or the Prepac

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little desk for the money. Well designed and well made. There is lots of hardware so it's really important to slow down and pay close attention to the directions. We're using the side shelf for our scanner but a small printer would fit there, if desired. Not cherry colored. It looks exactly like the photo on the website.
customer_reviews.author: LobsterLover

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great desk for a great price. It is really sturdy and pretty easy to assemble. The only problem with assembly was getting the screws into the keyboard tray, they were really hard to screw in with the provided screwdriver. But eventually I got them in and the keyboard tray works really smoothly. The top of the desk has a lot of room. I plan on getting 2 monitors in the future and there will be enough room to hold both. The keyboard tray is wide enough to hold my keyboard and mouse pad, but only barely. The side shelf seems to be pretty sturdy, it's nice that I can put it on either side. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Taft

customer_reviews.title: Still love it after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I work from home, but my "home office" is a corner of my bedroom. I was looking for a desk with a small footprint, but had a keyboard tray wide enough for my keyboard and mouse and desktop wide enough for 2 monitors. This desk has been perfect for that. I have been using this desk ~50 hours/week for 2 years, and it is still sturdy, not wobbly at all. The laminate hasn't peeled -- it still looks nice. I didn't install the tray on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Davis Mom

customer_reviews.title: A great desk
customer_reviews.text: All the tools you need are included, and while it'd be nice to have someone hold parts while you screw them in, it's absolutely possible to build this yourself. You will have to exert some force to turn some of the screws; assembly took me about half an hour. I have to say that I really enjoy having a keyboard tray; it makes a big difference ergonomically. There are plastic bumpers on the back of the bars that hold the feet so you can push the desk up against a wall without worrying about scratching paint off the baseboard, which is a very nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: C.L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Obviously, at this price point it is fake wood, but it's very nice fake wood! Smooth to the touch, nice shapes. Slightly bigger than I expected. Very comfortable for me, much better than the trayless IKEA desk I was using. It even comes with a small screwdriver. If you have a small case you could even put your PC on the printer tray. I can tell that I might want to get some WD-40 in the future, right now it slides in and out pretty well but I don't think it will in 1 or 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and to use
customer_reviews.text: So many products from China do not have understandable assembly instructions and this one does. In addition it has spare hardware ( very unusual) and even includes the tools needed, so I didn't have to rummage through my kitchen drawers to find a screwdriver and wrench -;). It is just what I needed and at a great price. My only other comment is that some of the photos do not show the attached printer table which is really handy for my morning coffee
customer_reviews.author: Tony Delcavo

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was well-packaged and is very sturdy. Instructions were clear and they even included the tools needed and extra screws! The large keyboard tray slides easily and I'm very pleased with the quality of the entire table. The table has extra room even with my Raspberry Pi, its 24" display, a USB hub, a couple of breadboards with Arduino microprocessors, and my 15" MacBook Pro. I'm using the printer shelf for a power strip and to hold jumper wires, etc. for my breadboards.
customer_reviews.author: bcomet

customer_reviews.title: A great little desk
customer_reviews.text: I would have to say that I've been satisfied with this desk. I've had it for over a year now and it hasn't broken or given out on me yet. It may not be the most stable thing you could put you things on but its completely acceptable especially for the price. The set up was challenging but the numbered items made it much easier. Over all for the price is a great hardy desk.
customer_reviews.author: Beckett K.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to assemble Desk
customer_reviews.text: After assembly many items it was refreshing to get a desk that was so organized. even had extra screws and they were marked as extras, It was very easy to assemble and they did supply the tools necessary to assemble this desk. The instructions were clear and easy to understand. Taking my time it took me less than an hour to assemble. The desk is solid and looks nice. The added desktop keyboard and screen for my laptop is at the right height. It is small but it has ample room on each side of the laptop. Good warranty on the desk.
customer_reviews.author: DavidTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Very nice desk. Happy happy happy
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a perfect little desk for the space that we have. It went together very easy. I liked the option of having the printer shelf on either side. It is very sturdy and all parts fit as expected. One thing that stood out to me in the assembly process is that they included a package of Spare fasteners for each type required. I thought this was a nice touch. It is sturdy and does not wobble like some inexpensive furniture has been known to. I would definitely recommend this desk for students or anyone with a space that you don't want to look crowded.
customer_reviews.author: A Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived swiftly. Instructions were good, steps easy to follow and also had each screw bag marked to easily identify which screw type goes where during assembly. Put it together in roughly an hour, however an extra set of hands could help in 1 or 2 areas. It came with a mini Phillips screwdriver to help assemble, which was a nice touch. I am able to comfortably slide my chair in under and utilize the keyboard tray. The desk and key board tray is pretty sturdy. Does not have any areas that feel flimsy. This does not resemble anything cheap so I feel it was a good purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Mindie

customer_reviews.title: Simple design, low cost, and serviceable enough for our kids' needs.
customer_reviews.text: This desk is maybe 3" too narrow for good placement of keyboard and mouse pad, and lacks the soft-stop ridge when t he keyboard shelf is fully extended - so it will slide back in with very little provocation. That said, the price is right for a very basic and simple-to-assemble desk. Components are adequate sturdiness for not-so-rough use, and the top is just large enough to place the desktop computer, monitor and a couple of basic speakers. If these little desks survive long enough, I'm going to send these little desks with the kids when they go to college, as they should pack up fairly nicely and won't take up a lot of space when set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Arr

customer_reviews.title: Top 3 Desk NA
customer_reviews.text: This desk is awesome. From the moment you open this package, it is a completely different furniture experience. All of the pieces are labeled well, the instructions are clear and sound, and it even includes spare parts! Once assembled, this desk is strong and sturdy, with lots of room. The size and shape are both very well designed, giving you the feel of a large desk, without taking up the space. The printer shelf is not terribly strong, but definitely strong enough to hold a printer. My relatively large printer rests on it easily, without causing the shelf to flex. All in all, incredible desk.
customer_reviews.author: Coury Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk!
customer_reviews.text: We just LOVE this desk. I got this desk for my daughter whom has a small bedroom and it fits perfectly! She has her desktop computer on it and still has space enough to put her pencil holders and wrote or draw. Highly recommend this small desk!
customer_reviews.author: Perla Berlanga

customer_reviews.title: A high quality computer desk for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I just put this desk together and I am very pleased with my purchase. It was very easy to put together. They even give you the tools (screwdriver and wrench) if you are not handy. Wait to tighten the bolts until it is put together so everything lines up. The slide out keyboard/mouse shelf works very smoothly. The quality of the parts is very good. The bolts are all labeled so you can't make a mistake if you read the instructions. For the price, this is a great computer desk.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: I did not like the gap that the keyboard hold leaves
customer_reviews.text: The desk is very solid and does not wobble, I did not like the gap that the keyboard hold leaves, My previous table left slightly more gap so I can type on my keyboard even when it's retracted without touching the top of the table. I often find myself doing that because the slider is too tight so it's hard to slide it all the way out, even when it's all the way out my finger still hit the bottom of the table when I need to reach for the keys towards the top.
customer_reviews.author: San Weng

customer_reviews.title: our desk is 2 years old. it has been ...
customer_reviews.text: our desk is 2 years old. it has been sitting in the same place for 2 years. I moved it slightly to clean the floor and the entire leg broke off. all of our electronics went crashing to the floor. there is almost no welding on the legs. the veneer over the wood is bubbling and was bubbling from the beginning. do not buy this desk.
customer_reviews.author: chickadee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little desk!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to put his new All-in-One PC on it because the monitor was too large for his other desk. It fit great in the small space he had left in his room and he loves it. The quality is great, especially for the price. I also liked how you could change which side the "printer" shelf was placed because we needed it on the left, not the right as pictured. The keyboard tray is perfect and slides in and out very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kays

customer_reviews.title: desk is a perfect size for what space i had to work in
customer_reviews.text: desk is a perfect size for what space i had to work in. A friend put it together and said it was quite easy to do. the only issue was the box came torn open on one end. not sure if anything was lost when I accepted delivery, but hoped it was in tacked. everything was there, and desk is now being used. the keyboard pad does not slide in/out as easy as my old desk; but maybe with repeated use it will. I needed a side shelf for a scanner and this was perfect. Overall all, good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan G.

customer_reviews.title: Magic Size desk--one size fits all?
customer_reviews.text: Good for a tall 7 year old...good for a 6 foot adult. Desk of magic. The first thing my daughter said was, "hate that color" I let her help me assemble it and them she loved it when it was put together. Took us 30 min, but the keyboard section pilot holes should be done with a drill as they are a tad off. This is a great workstation, but our printer is a bit big for it and hdmgd off the are as little bit. Other than that it's highly functional.
customer_reviews.author: King Jullian

customer_reviews.title: computer desk
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice desk and worth $80.00 delivered to your door. the description says juvenile, but the size seems like normal adult to me. my 22" monitor fits easy and my el gianto logitech keyboard and mouse fit fine on sliding tray. i have the chair all the way up with plenty on leg room.it took me 45 minutes to assemble the desk and i have lots of experience building stuff. the instructions were good and easy to follow, plus it came with tools. the parts all fit with no problem, and the finish of all the pieces is good so the desk looks good. i would buy another one or another techni mobili product.
customer_reviews.author: mr bill

customer_reviews.title: Small Width.. But Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that it was easy to assemble. (except that I could not understand the large wheel type stuff were pluck) It is small but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shaikh

customer_reviews.title: If you want sturdy...THIS is it!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one and the best of all since the keyboard tray pulls out way far...I'm envious of my husband who is the proud owner. Personally, I have a habit of leaning on my tray and it can take it without any problem...have had it for nearly 2 years now! It doesn't rock, move or wobble in any way. Plenty of room to stretch my legs out and I've found that a padded stool is the best with it since it allows lots of leg and foot movement so I don't get stiff. Plenty of desk space for the extra stuff I need out when I work and my 21.5" monitor. LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: love to learn

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this small area desk. Good quality, very sturdy, instructions clear and concise. Even supplied a good quality Phillip's screwdriver. Everything lined up on assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: Great little desk quite Stusdy
customer_reviews.text: I have a tight spot for my large computer, this is a perfect desk for me. Easy to assemble & quite sturdy, plenty of room for keyboard & mouse
customer_reviews.author: Kuldip S Tiwana

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, can assemble by yourself
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this by myself. It's very easy to do. The keyboard tray is great for ergonomics.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Form, Fit, and Function are first class. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very limited space for my computer and I thought this would fit. The quality of this product is outstanding. Assembly took about 45 minutes. Tools are provided. This desk is very well engineered. Everything went together with no fit problems. The manual is well written with good illustrations. They even provide a bag of spare screws. The side shelf works nicely with my HP-1512 printer. Overall width is 42 inches.
customer_reviews.author: WA8UOC

customer_reviews.title: but it's a nice desk. I'm not sure it would've suited what ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not the easiest to put together, but it's a nice desk. I'm not sure it would've suited what I bought it for but that's ok. it's a great desk, and they had everything perfectly labeled and even provided extras should you inevitably lose one!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great modern functional desk
customer_reviews.text: I'm buying a replacement desktop computer for my old laptop and needed a suitable desk with a keyboard tray, and this desk is perfect for my needs. The size may be smaller than some desks, so aesthetically pleasant, yet functional, for small spaces like my tiny living room. The desk arrived in just 2 days, 2 days earlier than expected, and I easily put it together in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: JHeg

customer_reviews.title: Good enough. One surface corner has a tire-like dent ...
customer_reviews.text: Good enough. One surface corner has a tire-like dent marks. The keyboard's four predrilled holes are not perfect aligned. Not quite sturdy. Expensive. If you have a Natural Ergonomic Keyboard 4000, you will find there isn't enough space for to place your mouse.
customer_reviews.author: loudheart

customer_reviews.title: Computer desk
customer_reviews.text: I liked the clean lines from the picture and needed something to fit in a small spare bedroom. This fit the bill perfectly. It was a bit tricky putting together as things did not fit exactly and it helped to use the picture on the box as a diagram as you go along. A screw driver and wrench came with it to put it together but you would be better off using real tools if you have them. Looks great when done.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Grimard III

customer_reviews.title: Solid little desk!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a small space in my room, and it was a good buy. I realize, however, that my computer is massive and barely fits in this thing. I had to supplement the bottom rack because my tower was that enormous. I like the keyboard slide out and the side shelf is sturdy and holds some weight. Will fit a small printer, not anything above 'small.' It is definitely sturdy, which I enjoy. If you need something small and don't need to store anything in it, this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Crompton

customer_reviews.title: very practical!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got it right away, my uncle put it together and didn't have any problems. I love it!! is practical everything fits fine the printer, shredder. I have a laptop so there is plenty of room for all your paperwork. the only thing that doesn't work is the keyboard tray that doesn't come out all the way, so it will be impossible to type! for me is not a problem because I have a laptop but it will be if you have a desktop
customer_reviews.author: Edna R.

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: Nice smaller desk, it works well for a small apartment. Looks very nice also.
customer_reviews.author: DCM

customer_reviews.title: Good little workstation for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Just barely fits my full size keyboard and mouse pad on the slide out tray. Desk is decently made for the price. It's not huge so if you really want a work station you can spread out on, this one might be a little bit limiting. Also the weight limits for the parts are on the lower side, something like ~40 lbs so make sure not to stack too much on top.
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This desk is exactly as pictured. I assembled it by myself in about 2 hours while watching Monday Night Football. It is sturdy, the exact color as seen in the picture and not the color "cherry" that most people are accustomed to seeing. I would say this wood is teak wood. The keyboard shelf is extra large and will accomodate a standard keyboard and mouse making it ergonomically great. The parts and screws were all in the box and labeled for easy assembly. They even include a small screwdriver and wrench which I have saved for other projects. Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Carmin Wharton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent desk
customer_reviews.text: It very good for home office, I am really enjoying it
customer_reviews.author: Abdelrahman Fahmy

customer_reviews.title: I love this desk...great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This desk is sturdy, and looks nice, it's a great buy for the price. I have had it for a while now and really like it. It works well for me
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble, perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: First of all I want to say this desk is super easy to assemble! I did it by myself within an hour and a half. Only one part was missing (four tiny screws that I have tons of at home). Pictures were very simple to understand and everything was labeled properly. Only negative thing I can say is that the color isn't exactly CHERRY. It's like a light bamboo. BUT, still very nice quality for the money! I'm very pleased with this purchase and highly recommed it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lissy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy here, but it is perfect for my needs and so far good quality. The side table is perfect for setting my laptop which on which I connect to my monitor, etc.
customer_reviews.author: jessijane

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This deck was easy to put together (I assembled it at work by myself without any extra tools in approx 20 min.) it came with a screwdriver. It is a perfect size for my computer monitor, CPU and keyboard with a good amount of workspace on top too. Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.author: BWS

customer_reviews.title: Compact Computer Desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk arrived on time and was very easy to assemble. Please note is compact/small however, the extra "printer" platform on the side as well as the keyboard tray provide allow for more space on top of the desk. I'm about 5'2 and this is the perfect desk for my size. When I am using my keyboard my arms are at ease in the downward position. In the short time I've had this desk I have noticed a decrease in the amount of neck and shoulder pain I was experiencing from working at a computer all day.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase, it serves its purpose and functional for ...
customer_reviews.text: A good purchase, it serves its purpose and functional for my use case. It is light, compact, right dimensions, and easy to assemble with good instructions. I could not use the printer tray because of my space restrictions. The workmanship and materials are ok, you get what you pay for. Recommend it, but don't set your expectations too high.
customer_reviews.author: Kumar Srinivasan

customer_reviews.title: I love this desk
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk. It good quality and sturdy. I must it in my room and it compact and out of the way. I put it together myself easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: It did say compact.
customer_reviews.text: Good little desk. However, good luck finding a printer that does not weigh over 10 # and is small enough to fit on this "printer shelf"
customer_reviews.author: P. McAnish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Computer Desk
customer_reviews.text: I order this computer desk for my Mom who lives a small apartment. It was fairly easy to put together and is very sturdy. It is an adult size, but doesn't take up too much room. She loves it!! The color does not look like Cherry, and is much lighter, but it didn't make any different to her. If you are looking for a small sturdy desk, at an affordable price, then this is the desk for you.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap computer desk
customer_reviews.text: Great little desk. Sturdy, easy to put together, and generally looks nice too. Shipping was fast as well. Im only giving it four stars due to a chip in the corner of the top part. It looks like it was chipped and then someone just crudely spread wood glue over it. Other than that though, this desk is great!
customer_reviews.author: McMurphy

customer_reviews.title: It's a perfect desk for a small apartment/room.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller desk to put into my living room that wouldn't take over the room. This desk is just perfect. Sturdy, small, just enough surface. No drawers, bays, nooks and crannies where CDs and papers go to die. (Perfect if you're a neat-freak like me!) Ignore the word "Juvenile" in the title. It fits this full-size adult just fine. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Glover

customer_reviews.title: I would have probably rated it higher if it had ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have probably rated it higher if it had come with instructions. It does its job and was the size I needed. However had to contact the company as it came with no instructions in the box.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Basic Winner
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for laptop printer and modem takes about 1/2 hour to assemble easy to follow instructions good quality for the $ only complaint could use a storage space
customer_reviews.author: K. lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. My son has used it for a while now and it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyD

customer_reviews.title: better than thought
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality is very good, especially for the price. The color is more a strawberry blonde which i happen to like, but the surface is not the cheap quality i was expecting, in fact it should endure with proper care (does not feel like laminate but like actual wood). Very sturdy and very good placement of shelves, the keyboard drawer move very well. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Metz

customer_reviews.title: great little desk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this desk to use with a laptop for studying/paperwork. While we have no use for the computer support at the bottom, I do plan on using that space for books or whatnot. Arrived quickly, and installed rather easily. I did have a couple of holes that were slightly covered by the coating material (?), and had to wiggle the screws in, but otherwise, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Five-6-Kilo

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk! The "printer" shelf can be mounted on ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk! The "printer" shelf can be mounted on either side. Looks sleek. Plenty of room for a 24" monitor, 2 JBL Pebble speakers, and some note/sketchbooks. However, the keyboard tray is ever so slightly cramped with a full sized mouse and keyboard. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my computer expansion project. I put a new computer on my old, large computer desk and jury-rigged a location for my old one. This desk allowed me to get rid of the unattractive short term solution and gain a very attractive long term one. Looks great and small footprint. Used the side shelf for paper organizers; too small for my Canon MX922 printer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Actually pretty perfect. There is actually another little shelf on ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually pretty perfect. There is actually another little shelf on the bottom that holds the computer tower. I actually love this desk. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Need Small side printer extension.
customer_reviews.text: Compact Computer Desk With Side Shelf And Keyboard Panel. Color: Cherry. System is great but was sondering if you have an additional side printer extension assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Nyogo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it is very sturdy. Big top, sliding keyboard shelf, shelf on side. The only thing I would change is the keyboard stand, I wish you could also move it up and down but it's only in and out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Just follow the easy to apply directions and
customer_reviews.text: The directions for assembling this well put together computer table are very very clear. Just follow the easy to apply directions and, voila, a quickly assembled table that holds all you need for computer use, including a printer. Even supplies just the right wrench and screw driver to do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Kovler

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: We like it and it was fairly easy to put together. Well worth the money. We have a small space and this desk fits in very well. Everything was well marked and the direction were well written.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Shaner

customer_reviews.title: Great little desks
customer_reviews.text: Great little desks, easy to put together when you follow the instructions (really, truly, give a second before you tighten all the things!). We bought two and have them in our small-ish office with a small table in between that holds our printer. The keyboard tray is just a wee bit small--I have a gaming keyboard and mouse, and with a gel mouspad and imak keyboard strip, it's a little cramped, but I make do.
customer_reviews.author: DeliberatelyDeb

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy
customer_reviews.text: Desk comfortably fits my dual monitors (a 24" and a slightly smaller repurposed TV). The keyboard tray is also well-sized and comes out far enough to allow full access to my keyboard's topmost row even with a wrist rest in front of it, which I could not do with my previous desk. Feels very solid and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Dear

customer_reviews.title: Don't Hesitate. Good bargain.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I didn't expect this desk to be so sturdy and secondly I thought it would be more difficult to put together. For a 70 year old man it took about an hour and 15 minutes (and only because I read the instructions). For $54.00 I would say this is a very good deal! I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hall

customer_reviews.title: Juvenile Computer Desk
customer_reviews.text: This is a great small desk for a child. I thought it was very easy to put together and is very stable. It was missing one of the plugs to the bottom leg and I contacted the company & they shipped me out one immediately.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mellott

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to assembly, great price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small computer desk for my son. This was the winner by far after hours of browsing through hundreds of items. Very happy with the look and design. I like that it does not have wheels, but instead comes with adjustable legs. It makes it more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Vitalie

customer_reviews.title: ... could use my old computer and it works just fine. It's not that big but it still has ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so I could use my old computer and it works just fine. It's not that big but it still has working room. "Thumbs" here put it together easily so I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Good space-saver desk
customer_reviews.text: Although this is advertized as a children's desk, adults can take full use of its surface area and get quite a bit of objects on it without it feeling cluttered. This is a good desk for small spaces such as bedrooms, dorms, apartments, etc. or if you need a workspace but do not want to devote a lot of space to a big manager's desk or L-desk.
customer_reviews.author: Sutter

customer_reviews.title: Great desk!
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk with a lot of space. The side counter thing is good for setting my beer bottle / drinks ps4 controller / cell phone / remotes and etc.
customer_reviews.author: Michael V.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ADULT DESK
customer_reviews.text: Desk is big enough for adults. The color is like the picture, not like a cherry brown red wood. It is very sturdy. I loved how the manufacturer labeled the screws/parts because this made it easier to assemble. I was able to put this together by myself and it took about 1 hour, which is not bad for one person.
customer_reviews.author: sweetmayberry

customer_reviews.title: Very nice setup. I had very little space to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice setup. I had very little space to put my computer. This desk really made it possible to have my computer set up with a comfortable amount of arm and leg room. The assembly was very easy to understand and it took less than an hour to assemble it with the help of another person.
customer_reviews.author: Sbergh

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nice
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely a grab. Sturdy, nice, easy to lift and maneuver, and doesn't take up much room. Was also very easy to assemble, with instructions being very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Leo H

customer_reviews.title: Great product for new home office
customer_reviews.text: Works well and fits perfectly in my small apartment. Great desk for teleworking during quarantine. I was able to hold both monitors, keyboard, laptop with charging dock and mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Elianna Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Sturdy Desk!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice desk! Super sturdy, and thick. Looks even better in person. The depth is fantastic! Much deeper than I thought. I recommend this desk to anyone with a small space, who has a large screen computer :)
customer_reviews.author: cerhb6

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, instruction were clear, hardware clearly labeled, tools included. Even came with one extra screw of every type in case one went missing. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Dual function desk
customer_reviews.text: The desk is compact and doesn't take up a lot of space. I like being able to have my computer keyboard on the slide out, and my music keyboard on the desktop in front of my monitors, making the desk a dual function piece of furniture. My laptop sits on the side table. A small printer would fit, but I like having my computer there.
customer_reviews.author: TLL

customer_reviews.title: Need an affordable computer desk? This is it!
customer_reviews.text: Great Desk, definitely for an adult, too! Not using the lower shelf, or the keyboard shelf, yet, as I have a laptop, but they still get use (for writing and storage, respectively!). Was worried printer wouldn't fit, but it does, and its height and position are very functional, too. Desk overall is a great height, and has sturdy construction. For a minimalist, looking for an affordable, quality computer desk, it was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a desk that wouldn't be too big or bulky, I only have a laptop and no desktop. This desk is just as pictured. It takes up very little room but it also big enough for my laptop and a textbook to fit. My boyfriend had very little trouble setting it up. Also great price and came quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashtah

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we bought. First for the wife and now for me. Since the first time we bought it, it looks like they removed the computer tray at the bottom. Nothing to complain about here; didn't use it anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Cazares

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great for the price and easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to put together. Great value. Just enough room for a printer too.
customer_reviews.author: Janet W.

customer_reviews.title: Desk for my medical students
customer_reviews.text: The desk is put together and waiting for new students when they arrive. Looks pretty sturdy and was easy to assemble for my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Fox

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Got it to be my photo editing desk. Mac mini fits well on the little side shelf and it fits in a small office. Nothing to dislike yet!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little desk for limited space
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my new desk. The whole thing feels solid and well put together. This is used in a small space and is perfect. Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron E

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so impressed with this desk! I was able to put it together in less than an hour (a record for me)! The directions were clear and all the parts were clearly labeled. I love it! It's the perfect size and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Got this today and am very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got this today and am very happy with the purchase. It's quality made and feels like it. Super sturdy. The bottom feet swivel so it can accomodate uneven floors. Great, and just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yu

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for the money
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and lightweight to mover around. Great Buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Knowing that it was particle board was a worry but all the surfaces are covered nicely with a sealed finish. I believe it will hold up to many dirty hands and accidental drips. Size is great - not too small to be useful and no extra room where it wouldn't be needed.
customer_reviews.author: L. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: I had this in a room ready to give away until someone came over, read the directions, and sat with me while we put the table together. It's a long desk, solid and is utilitarian. And that totally works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Desk
customer_reviews.text: I've had this desk for almost a year now, and it's wonderful. Easy to assemble, the desk it's very sturdy (doesn't wabble at all after a year) and ample enough to do your homework at while working on the computer. The CPU base is very covenient, as well as the printer base (I have a far larger printer than the one shown in the picture). The colors are exactly as shown on the picture, very well finishes. I will definetely recommend to anyone looking for a product that is cheap, good-looking and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Don't pass by this one
customer_reviews.text: Great Little Desk. I just got this and was very easy to put together took about 30 minutes and very sturdy fits in small spot and the printer table fits my printer
customer_reviews.author: spl42Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was an excellent product for the cost. Went together very easy and is plenty sturdy for its intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Tally Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for a cheap office desk
customer_reviews.text: You can't get a much better desk in the sub $100 range. I bought 5 of them for my studio. Each one works great and looks great. Some had a hard time getting put together though as some of the parts don't quite line up. But we have been using them for a few months now and they are holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: jhample

customer_reviews.title: the desk looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: When put together, the desk looks just like the picture. It is the perfect size for a young student with a computer and hardware, or even an adult! It fits well in our tiny home office, and it's sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Critique Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great desktop for amazing price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this desk for over a year and it's held up beautifully. It holds up my 85 pound alienware rig as well as some odds and ends and has not faltered at all. It was very easy to assemble and took maybe an hour or two- it's hard for me to remember exactly, we did put it up over a year ago. I just remember it being really easy.
customer_reviews.author: Skarmy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice desk
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old grandson picked out this desk and I purchased it for him after reading good reviews for this item. The reviews were right on spot. This is a very nice desk at a great price. Very solid and easy to put together. My grandson put it together in no time! I would recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: debbieg1

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: using it now its sturdy got here quick and all other aspect of the order went real well. However, the mailman almost left it outside my front door without any signatures or anything... but thats not the vendors fault.
customer_reviews.author: K. Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. I usually hate building things because of ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I usually hate building things because of the hassle I know I'm about to go through. But this product was different, the directions were fantastically easy to understand. The directions were a simple 9 steps and I was done right away. I love the wood finish of this desk. It's so smooth and very durable as a whole, it even holds my mid-tower gaming pc. I recommend this to anyone who has been looking for the right computer desk but couldn't decide.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The desk is sturdy, it was easy to assemble, it only took about 20 minutes and the desk top was large enough to fit my 20" monitor and my speakers and bass. I recommend this desk to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: irisherin

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: This one is easy to assemble, sturdy and it's got one of the best instructions i've ever seen. Even the screws are already labeled so you don't run into any confusion. I totally recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Christopher HL

customer_reviews.title: Best desk for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.text: The structure is strong, the desk looks great. Its spacious enough for a computer set up but not too large where its crowding a room. I couldnt find a better desk and this one happens to be alot lest expensive than all the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Carrasquillo

customer_reviews.title: We were very pleased. With my help
customer_reviews.text: We were very pleased. With my help, my husband had no problem putting it together. He had to use his own power screwdriver. It works well for us in a mobile home without taking too much space in our living room. Also, it is an attractive blond wooden color (very light oak maybe) and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: WV Customer

product_meta.title: Compact Computer Desk With Side Shelf And Keyboard Panel. Color: Cherry
product_meta.description: This Techni Mobili Compact Computer Desk saves space with its compact footprint. It has a simple yet sturdy design made of heavy-duty engineered wood panels with a moisture resistant PVC laminate veneer and a scratch-resistant powder-coated steel frame. It features a slide-out keyboard shelf equipped with a safety stop,and a side accessory shelf. The slide-out keyboard shelf and accessory shelf each have a 30 lb weight capacity, while the desktop can hold up to 80 lbs.
feature_bullets: Heavy-Duty MDF Panels with a Moisture Resistant PVC Laminate Vaneer in Cherry Finish
Pull Out Keyboard Tray Equipped with a safety stop
Side Printer Shelf and Privacy Panel
5 Year Limited Warrenty, Ships in 1 Box

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars327 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
